thread.title: Laowai Not: New York drummer brings Latin beats to Beijing
thread.title_full: Laowai Not: New York drummer brings Latin beats to Beijing - Telegraph

author: Jack Sun , China Daily
title: Laowai Not: New York drummer brings Latin beats to Beijing
text: More news, analysis and features at China Watch Born in the Bronx, New York, Kris began playing the congas and dicovered his passion in music at an early age. Kris now plays in a Latin music band in Beijing to promote Latin music and culture in China. He has been in Beijing for about four years, and it took only four years to transform this New Yorker into a Beijinger. Kris loves his new home and decides to stay here as long as he can. This is his story. This article was originally produced and published by China Daily . View the original article here . â€¢ Read more about Chinese current affairs at China Watch
